name: The night of fire stealing/盗火之夜
description: The night of fire stealing is a retro wind JRPG game made by RPGmaker MV. The game is set in China during 1920. You play as Zhou Shuren, who adventures in Shanghai with two girl administrators, Friedrich and Karl, while exploring an unknown world full of mythological and philosophical elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
